programme.title: Our World
programme.desc: In June 2020, three friends filmed themselves finding bodies in a suitcase. As their videos went viral, the lives of the victims, Jessica and Austin, were lost to rumour and speculation as people online combed through their story. Over the course of the two year trial, Our World follows the families as they try to get justice for their children, lost in a social media storm.
